data.title: Kids Fun Pads
data.meta_description: What are FunPads & FunPacks? FunPads and FunPacks are packed full of activities, games, jokes, puzzles, and colouring crayons designed to keep children aged from 3 upwards occupied and entertained. The unique ‘tear-off sheet’ FunPad or folded FunPack formats are quick, simple and extremely cost effective ways to keep little folk happy in any venue […]

Kildare is a county widely recognised for its Art and Culture so when we were approached by the Kildare Arts Council about collaborating with them for a new project we jumped at the chance. They were keen to get children

“I wish we had something to occupy the kids ”

Believe it or not, it was actually this simple question that eventually led Tom Byrnes to quit the rat race and create the children’s FunPack.

Hotel Managers had been asking if there was anything to keep kids entertained and in their seats. The only options were cheap colouring pages, broken crayons or perhaps activity bags from China which were bulky and costly.

Being a parent himself Tom knew there was surely a solution to this problem so he started to sketch out something that wasn’t a bag but came as a complete product with everything included within itself and so the FunPack was born.

Hotels, restaurants and pubs were quick to pick up on this unique and cost effective activity pack for kids that really did keep the children occupied and busy while mum and dad could relax and enjoy themselves.

It is an Irish product produced in Ireland with each pack regularly updated to ensure that it indeed lives up to the billing of entertaining Kids. The FunPack not only works by keeping kids entertained and in their seats, it also adds to the whole family experience and feedback suggests that this leads to repeat business. That is why we have worked with many different clients in the hospitality, travel and charity sector as the FunPack has a proven winning formula.

Thanks for visiting our site and if there is anything that you need

please do not hesitate to contact us.

FunPads & FunPacks are compact convenient and a great way to keep kids entertained when families are out and about.

Who can use FunPads and FunPacks?

Our products are perfect for any business where kids need to be occupied and entertained!

Our customers in the hospitality sector especially restaurants and hotels have improved their bottom-line with our FunPads and FunPacks. We all know that bored kids don’t make for relaxed parents but relaxed parents will ‘linger longer’ and order that extra drink, coffee or dessert.

Airlines, ferries and trains are the perfect place for FunPacks and FunPads. Compact, lightweight and fully recyclable, our card and paper based products contain no metal, sharp edges or toxic materials

Our customers in the hospitality sector especially restaurants and hotels have improved their bottom-line with our FunPads and FunPacks. We all know that bored kids don’t make for relaxed parents but relaxed parents will ‘linger longer’ and order that extra drink, coffee or dessert.

Charities looking for a creative way to raise funds have used our products to run competitions, raffles etc. Talk to us today, we’re packed full of creative ideas!

“Check out some of our case studies to see how the unique FunPack and FunPad format is working for an array of diverse clients”

Fun Packs have allowed

us to upsell our kids

offering and increase

our turnover.

10 good reasons why you should give FunPads and FunPacks a go…

There are a whole host of reasons why leading businesses are choosing FunPads and FunPacks. Here’s a snap shot of just a few…

They are Fun and Educational Products produced in Ireland which means they are Zero-rated for VAT

They can be provided as a complimentary product to promote a family environment or sold with margins averaging well over 100%

We have some of the quickest turnaround times in the business which means getting the Pads and Packs out to you in a quarter of the time it would take to order from China or overseas.

Accompanying Point of sale Units can also be provided

Families dining out are more likely to spend more time (and money) in your business if the kids are entertained and occupied

Our products can be fully customised inside and out to display your brand logo and convey your own message in turn raising brand awareness (T&Cs/MOQs apply)

FunPads are very cost effective. €99 (online) will keep over 600 kids busy while their parents enjoy your offering.

We’re constantly developing new designs and fun activities for our products as well as seasonal specials (Christmas, Halloween etc.). Kids will never get bored of the same old thing.

FunPads and FunPacks are produced with sustainably sourced paper and card, and are fully recyclable. The crayons are safety certified and fully non-toxic.

We all know that some kids spend too much time glued to phones and tablets. Our products help develop practical cognitive and creative skills in a fun and healthy way.

Keeping one child entertained costs only 10 cents with FunPads. When our family customers stay a little longer for coffee and dessert, that’s some return!
